actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38 of the United States Code to make veterans with more than 89 days' active duty eligible for veterans educational benefits.

summary.text: Provides that veterans with more than eighty-nine days active duty (presently one hundred and eighty days) shall be eligible for veterans' educational benefits payable by the Veterans' Administration. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1652(a)).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38 of the United States Code to make veterans with more than 89 days' active duty eligible for veterans educational benefits.
